channel.title: {Question, dunno if this is the right section} C4D Architectural Edition
channel.description:
Has anyone here actually used it? Is it worth buying? How good is it for room modeling, etc.?
Thx, io9~`

item.title: {Question, dunno if this is the right section} C4D Architectural Edition
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

I used this for my work experience.
I went to a designer in cambridge.

I suck at 3d imagingg, so I wasn’t any good,
But the stuff my mentor was coming out with was amazing.

It took quite alot of getting used to, I was helped because my mentor was like a talking tutorial site.

-JV

Read full topic

item.title: {Question, dunno if this is the right section} C4D Architectural Edition
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

It’s alright, depends what all you’re doing.
There are much better more archviz suited programs out there though.

Don’t expect to just buy it and be good or anything though. Big mistake.
